_header: In the third day of May
_description: The Boy and the Mantle — 196 lines in quatrains

BLAdd27879.First Lines: In the third day of MayTo Carleile did come…
BLAdd27879.Last Lines:
…Euerye such a louely ladyeGod send her well to
                    speede
